name: School App Kerala
description: Edu App For Teachers, Head Teachers & Parents ``````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````  > News Updates  - All edu news updates notification service  > Resource Updates - Quizzes , Modules , Day Celebrations ,Model Question Papers etc..  > Helps To do School Related Works From Mobile - Sampoorna, SPARK, GainPF, Scholarships, MDM Entry, etc..  > Malayalam News Updates - Get all news updates from main Malayalam dailies in E-library Page  > Class Resources ( 1 - +2 ) - Text books  - Worksheets  - Hand Books - Audio & Video Resources - Resource blog Links  > Live IT & Service Help - You can ask or discuss via chat page  > Dictionary  - English - Malayalam - Malayalam - Malayalam  > Forms - All School Related Forms are listed here  > Software For Schools - Free Softwares for Schools (Income Tax, Kalippetti, Printer Drivers etc.  > All School & Department Contacts - All High Schools - AEO Offices - DEO Offices - DDO Offices - DPI Sections  > School Blogs - Maths Blog - Mentors Kerala - HSS LiVE - Almudariseen - Shenni Blog - Head Masters Blog etc...  > Online/PC Version support (Web Address Available in Help Page )  > Direct Phone/WhatsApp App Support (Number Available in Help Page)      Disclaimer :- Webpages showing through app are owned/managed by the developer or with the written consent of the webpage owner
